```{r}

#| include: false
library(readr)

my_data<- read_csv("../data/student-dataset.csv")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

my_data<- my_data |>
  rename(
    DNI = ID,
    Nombre = Name,
    sexo = Gender,
    edad = Age,
    Peso = Weight_kg,
    Altura = Height_cm,
    Bebida_preferida = Preferred_Beverage,
    Tamano_del_Hogar = Household_Size
  ) |>
  mutate(sexo = ifelse(sexo == "Female", "Mujer", "Hombre"))
```
